content.question: What is the greatest personal privacy risk posed to users by this class design?

choices.label: The class contains no mutator methods.
Personal information can be determined from outside the class using information that has  public  visibility.
If the ID numbers are assigned consecutively, the total number of users can be determined.

content.answer: Personal information can be determined from outside the class using information that has  public  visibility.
